name: getVariablesInRole
shortDescription: Returns all variables of a role
description: This method returns all variables of a role.

parameters.name: roleId
parameters.description: The ID of the role as returned by createRole() or getRoles().

returnValue: Returns variables assigned to the specified role. The root element is a Struct with all peer IDs as key and all channels as value (Struct). The channels again have the variables as value (Array<String>).
